00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"

00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qf_new)

00037 //............................................................................
00038 QEvent *QF::new_(uint16_t evtSize, QSignal sig) {
00039                     // find the pool id that fits the requested event size ...
00040     uint8_t id = (uint8_t)0;
00041     while (evtSize > QF_EPOOL_EVENT_SIZE_(QF_pool_[id])) {
00042         ++id;
00043         Q_ASSERT(id < QF_maxPool_);      // cannot run out of registered pools
00044     }
00045 
00046     QS_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00047     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QF_NEW, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00048         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00049         QS_EVS_(evtSize);                             // the size of the event
00050         QS_SIG_(sig);                               // the signal of the event
00051     QS_END_()
00052 
00053     QEvent *e;
00054     QF_EPOOL_GET_(QF_pool_[id], e);
00055     Q_ASSERT(e != (QEvent *)0);             // pool must not run out of events
00056 
00057     e->sig = sig;                                 // set signal for this event
00058 
00059                                  // store the dynamic attributes of the event:
00060                                  // the pool ID and the reference counter == 0
00061     e->dynamic_ = (uint8_t)((id + 1) << 6);
00062     return e;
00063 }
